itunes:title: Salon Ownership; The Good, The Bad & The Ugly
title: Salon Ownership; The Good, The Bad & The Ugly
description:
In today's episode we are joined by fellow salon owner Krista (@kjostyles) as we talk the up's and down's of salon ownership, hear her own journey to ownership and also read comments from salon owners across the country! 

FOLLOW US!

Instagram: @justjessiiii, @jz.styles, @jzstyles.co, @jzacademy

Krista: @kjostyles

Youtube:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJHdXrSTttb1MaXG3hB3JuA

New Episodes every Friday!
